name: LOG_FILTER_TYPE
description: The output log level of the SDK.

parameters.LOG_FILTER_OFF: 0: Do not output any log information.

parameters.LOG_FILTER_DEBUG: 0x080f: Output all log information. Set your log filter as DEBUG if you want to get the most complete log file.

parameters.LOG_FILTER_INFO: 0x000f: Output CRITICAL, ERROR, WARNING, and INFO level log information. We recommend setting your log filter as this level.

parameters.LOG_FILTER_WARN: 0x000e: Output CRITICAL, ERROR, and WARNING level log information.

parameters.LOG_FILTER_ERROR: 0x000c: Output CRITICAL and ERROR level log information.
